page.description: Invoke an action event in the named dialog - flags I)mmediate, W)ait for input idle.

argument.name: event
argument.description: The name of the event to pass.

argument.name: flags
argument.description: I - Immediate. Causes the script to stop executing until the event has completed executing. W - Wait for idle. I.e. wait until the next idle cycle to execute the event. The script can continue executing before the event has completed executing.

page.discussion: The UI_DLG_EVENT() function invokes an action event in the specified modeless dialog. The function will generate an error if the specified dialog does not exist. Use UI_MODELESS_DLG_EXIST() to test if the dialog exist before calling its event. Otherwise, you can use UI_DLG_OPTIONAL_EVENT(), which does not generate an error.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example receives and displays status from multiple user defined functions.
section.example: function status_list as v () dim completed as C dim message2 as C completed = "" ui_modeless_dlg_box("StatusList",<<%dlg% Completed:; [.100,5^#completed]; Current task:; [.100message2?.t.]; ; %dlg%,<<%code% if (a_dlg_button = "close") then ui_modeless_dlg_close("statuslist") end if if (atc("Completed:",a_dlg_button) = 1) then completed_i = substr(a_dlg_button,11) completed = completed + crlf()+ completed_i completed = remove_blank_lines(completed) ui_modeless_dlg_refresh("statuslist") end if if (atc("Working:",a_dlg_button) = 1) then message2 = substr(a_dlg_button,9) ui_modeless_dlg_refresh("statuslist") end if %code%) end function

section.description: The calling user defined function calls the StatusList dialog with variations of the following syntax:
section.example: if (ui_modeless_dlg_exist("StatusList")) then ui_dlg_event("StatusList", "working:Listing files in " + directory, "I") end if if (ui_modeless_dlg_exist("StatusList")) then ui_dlg_event("StatusList", "completed:Adding " + directory + " files to database", "I") end if
